properties.entry: SELECT USER_CD, USER_ID, USER_PW FROM USERTEST1
SELECT USER_CD, USER_ID, USER_PW FROM USERTEST1 ORDER BY USER_CD DESC LIMIT 1;
INSERT INTO USERTEST1 (USER_CD, USER_ID, USER_PW) VALUES(?,?,?)
INSERT INTO USERTEST1 ( USER_CD, USER_ID, USER_PW ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE USERTEST1 SET USER_ID = ? , USER_PW = ? WHERE USER_CD = ?
